fullText:
The core of Gauntlet AI operations is 5 custom-built apps:

* Student application
* Portal & grading
* Certification & graduation
* HQ & logistics
* Hiring & matching

More than 1 million lines of code.

All but five lines were written by AI.

Costs us 10 cents/month to run.
